name: Loot Rascals
storyline:
Only you can save Big Barry, a terraforming robot, from a space theme park overrun by a sprawling transdimensional creature.

Explore a strange planet, face a unique bestiary and win cards with multiple abilities. Use strategy to equip them: their location can be crucial, and destroying them grants you healing and powers.

But beware, your enemies are pocketing you! The cards they steal are sent to other players' games. By defeating an elite monster, you will get the card of one of them. Will you send it back to him?

Whatever decision you make, prepare to receive a holographic visit: will it be an ally or an enemy? Loot Rascals is above all a story of friendship, loss and redemption!

Every game is different in this procedural-generation rogue-like: collect cards, check out the thing below, and soar to victory with Big Barry!
summary: Only you can rescue Big Barry - your huge robot head pal - from a space theme park that’s been invaded by a tentacled pan-dimensional godbeast.
